item.title: 5 Rails Conf 2021 Talks for Early Career Devs
item.description: Rails Conf 2021 talks are all available on YouTube. That is great, except that now you have to go through the +100 talks to decide which one to watch first! If you are just getting started with your Rails journey, here are the top 5 talks for you (with resources): 1. Implicit to Explicit: Decoding Ruby’s Magical Syntax by Justin Gordon [Workshop] Do you wish you could understand better what Rails do under the hood?
